Package com.ibm.iotf.client.app

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandCallback Deprecated
    This interface would be eventually replaced by com.ibm.iotf.client.device.CommandCallback
    Currently retained for command subscription by application Interface to provide callback methods for command subscription
    This can be used by applications to subscribe to commands
    EventCallback  
    StatusCallback  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationClient
    A client, used by application, that handles connections with the IBM Internet of Things Foundation.
    ApplicationStatus
    Class that handles application status, of applications using IBM Internet of Things Foundation
    Command Deprecated
    This would be eventually replaced by com.ibm.iotf.client.device.Command
    However, currently it is retained for command subscription by application This class has only accessors and no mutators and later on might be made final
    DeviceStatus  
    Event  
    Status
